get_from_dict(dic, key)[source]¶

get an value from the dictionary using a key but instead of None return an empty string if it does not exist

Parameters:
  • dic – the dictionary to be search
  • key – key of the value to be obtained
Return type:

value of the key in the dictionary or empty string
